DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy bimatoprost solution formulation A compare bimatoprost solution 0.03 % ( LATISSEÂ® ) vehicle treatment eyelash hypotrichosis ( inadequate eyelash ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female adult patient eyelash hypotrichosis ( inadequate eyelash growth ) . Damage eyelid area ( scar ) may prevent growth eyelash Active eye disease ( glaucoma , uveitis , eye infection , chronic blepharitis severe dry eye ) Eye eyelid surgery ( include laser , refractive , intraocular filtering surgery , blepharoplasty ) 3 month prior screen Current eyelash implant kind Eyelash tint dye application within 2 month baseline Eyelash extension application within 3 month baseline Use eyelash growth product within 6 month baseline Treatments may affect hair growth ( minoxidil , cancer chemotherapeutic agent , etc ) within 6 month prior baseline .
